titleStmt.title: The soules possession of Christ: shewing how a Christian should put on Christ, and bee able to doe all things through his strength. Whereunto in annexed A sermon preached at the funerall of that worthy divine Mr. Wimott, late minister of Clare, in Suffolke. By T.H.
titleStmt.author: Hooker, Thomas, 1586-1647.

titleStmt.title: The soules possession of Christ: shewing how a Christian should put on Christ, and bee able to doe all things through his strength. Whereunto in annexed A sermon preached at the funerall of that worthy divine Mr. Wimott, late minister of Clare, in Suffolke. By T.H.
titleStmt.author: Hooker, Thomas, 1586-1647.
Hooker, Thomas, (1586-1647). Spiritual Munition: a funeral sermon.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M. F[lesher]. for Francis Eglesfield, at the sign of the Marigold in Pauls Church-yard [and for Robert Dawlman, at the signe of the Brazen Serpent ...],

notesStmt.note: "Spiritual Munition: a funeral sermon." has separate dated title page, pagination, and register with imprint "... for Robert Dawlman, at the signe of the Brazen Serpent ...".
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library, Cambridge, England.
